server moduleÂ¶

Multi-threaded HTTP server setup that runs the detection HTTP handler.

Features: - Uses ThreadedHTTPServer to handle multiple simultaneous requests. - Dynamically obtains local IP address to bind the server. - Runs the server in a background thread to allow graceful shutdown. - Handles KeyboardInterrupt (Ctrl+C) to stop the server cleanly. - Integrates with a logging system to report server events.
